alert.note: Alert for Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tazewell County through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tiptop, or 7 miles north of Tazewell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bluefield... Tazewell... Pocahontas... Tiptop... Gratton... and Boissevain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
